and concat(q.title, ifnull(q.userId, ''), ifnull(q.contents, '')) like concat(concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))

order by q.issueTime desc

mapper.delete: delete from tb_question where questionId in(${ids})
mapper.insert: insert tb_question(questionId, userId, title, contents, questionImage, issueTime, questionScore) value (#{questionId}, #{userId}, #{title}, #{contents}, "LU", now(), 1.00)
